amendment.description: To promote job creation, and small business preservation in the adjustment of the Federal minimum wage.

action.text: Amendment SA 2115 proposed by Senator Enzi.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2115.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2115 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 57. Record Vote Number: 258.
Amendment SA 2115 ruled out of order by the chair.
